doc:
Michael Kostroff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Kostroff 0 Michael Kostroff (born May 22, 1961) is an American actor. He appeared on the HBO program The Wire as defense attorney Maurice Levy. Kostroff starred in the fifth season of the series and appeared in all four earlier seasons as a guest star. Michael_Kostroff ( born May_22_,_1961 ) is an_American_actor . He appeared on the_HBO_program The_Wire as defense_attorney_Maurice_Levy . Kostroff starred in the_fifth_season of the_series and appeared in all_four_earlier_seasons as a_guest_star .
